text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis llj., Minnesota
July 9, 1957
Mr. Frank Schooley
Station WILL-AM-FM-TV
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
Have we had a final reaction from the Ford people to
our request for funds?
I don*t recall having seen anything from you on this.
This being the beginning of the new fiscal year, we*re going
to be in a bad way if we don*t hear from Ford soon.
I hope the hot weather isn*t getting you down too much.
We had a rough time Sunday, but things are much cooler now.
Yovttt sincerely.
BPikls
Burton Paulu
President.
